summary: A group of ruthless pirates attack a seventeenth century Huguenot settlement on the Isle of Devon in search of treasure and will stop at nothing to obtain it.
cast: Kerwin Mathews|Glenn Corbett|Christopher Lee|Peter Arne|Marla Landi|Oliver Reed|Andrew Keir|Michael Ripper|David Lodge|Dennis Waterman|Jack Stewart|Lorraine Clewes|Jerold Wells|Diane Aubrey|John Bennett|Richard Bennett|Ronald Blackman|Bill Brandon|John Collin|Marie Devereux|George Hilsdon|Don Levy|Desmond Llewelyn|Michael Mulcaster|Jim O'Brady|Michael Peake|Dido Plumb|Keith Pyott|Ernie Rice|John Roden|Denis Shaw|Bert Simms|Emile Stemmler
title: The Pirates of Blood River
